column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a Chicago native now living in California
column2: I was really looking forward to some great deep dish pizza when visiting Chi Town recently. Lou Malnati's was underwhelming. Pizza was just OK. Great crust
column4: but really pretty bland. The sausage seemed to have no real flavor
column5: which is not what I expect in Chicago. Since there's no real "sauce" on a deep dish pizza
column6: the other ingredients need to carry the day when it comes to flavor. Even on a pizza loaded up with bell peppers
